title: Visit Aavegotchi URLs
body:
This proposal is to make Aavegotchis visible when visiting a specific URL, without having to connect a wallet. 

For example: https://aavegotchi.com/gotchi/9258

As it stands, unless you own the Aavegotchi you are visiting, you can not see It .

By agreeing to this, it makes it possible to share aavegotchis with friends who are not part of this experience yet.
author: 0x12668165569DeFFA1a556B1A5220F799e727f23D
